title: [Minecraft1.13＋]木牌商店
author: TopGary
txt_content:
在做木牌商店时，木牌上的字体单行一旦做颜色区分就不能，使命令执行，先上代码[单行中无颜色区分正确执行]
Basic
P: scoreboard objectives add money dummy {"text":"[iConomy]","color":"yellow","bold":"true"}
P: scoreboard objectives add item dummy
P: scoreboard objectives setdisplay sidebar money

Recycle
P: give @a minecraft:birch_sign{BlockEntityTag:{Text1:'{"text":"[RECYCLE-SHOP]","color":"dark_red","bold":"true","clickEvent":{"action":"run_command","value":"/execute as @a store result score @s item run data get entity @s SelectedItem.Count"}}',Text2:'{"text":"Item: Grass_Block","color":"dark_blue","clickEvent":{"action":"run_command","value":"/scoreboard players add @s[scores={item=32..},nbt={SelectedItem:{id:\"minecraft:grass_block\"}}] money 110"}}',Text3:'{"text":"Price: 110JC/HG","color":"gold","clickEvent":{"action":"run_command","value":"/clear @s[scores={item=32..},nbt={SelectedItem:{id:\"minecraft:grass_block\"}}] minecraft:grass_block 32"}}',Text4:'{"text":"","clickEvent":{"action":"run_command","value":"/tellraw @s[scores={item=32..},nbt={SelectedItem:{id:\"minecraft:grass_block\"}}] {\"text\":\"Selling succeeds!\",\"color\":\"yellow\"}"}}'},display:{Name:'{"text":"Recycle","color":"yellow"}'}} 1

Sell
P: give @a minecraft:birch_sign{BlockEntityTag:{Text1:'{"text":"[SELL-SHOP]","color":"dark_red","bold":"true","clickEvent":{"action":"run_command","value":"/give @s[scores={money=300..}] minecraft:grass_block 64"}}',Text2:'{"text":"Item: Grass_Block","color":"dark_blue","clickEvent":{"action":"run_command","value":"/tellraw @s[scores={money=..299}] {\"text\":\"Purchase failed!\",\"color\":\"dark_red\"}"}}',Text3:'{"text":"Price: 300JC/G","color":"gold","clickEvent":{"action":"run_command","value":"/tellraw @s[scores={money=300..}] {\"text\":\"Purchase succeeds!\",\"color\":\"yellow\"}"}}',Text4:'{"text":"","clickEvent":{"action":"run_command","value":"/scoreboard players remove @s[scores={money=300..}] money 300"}}'},display:{Name:'{"text":"Sell","color":"yellow"}'}} 1复制代码问题部分：无颜色区分命令正确执行：Text1:'{"clickEvent":{}........}'
                有颜色区分木牌显示正常命令无法执行：Text1:'["",{color1},{color2},{color3}]'
之前试过用extra,但木牌连正确显示字体都无法做到，不知道是不是用不了了
我想既能让木牌单行字体每个字颜色都不同，又能执行代码，怎么解决，跪求大佬出山！！

replies.author: TopGary
replies.txt_content:
Sssss... 发表于 2020-2-29 17:53
发错了 要用§的unicode %u00A7替换掉颜色代码的字符即可直接写在text里
如果是直接用unicode转译很麻烦，我之前用命令方块给木牌，在再点击木牌修改转译命令方块很麻烦，而且1.15版本好像unicode转移后的代码会导致运行失败或者转译在命令行中显示错误，所以才用的color

replies.author: 牛奶泡悠悠
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 牛奶泡悠悠 于 2020-2-29 19:07 编辑 

非主要问题：scoreboard objectives add money dummy {"text":"[iConomy]","color":"yellow","bold":"true"}
此处的 true 不需要加双引号

主要问题：
第 7 和第 10 行 clickEvent 中 value 里的双引号需要再进行一次转义（即将 \" 改为 \\"）

replies.author: 晴路卡
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 晴路卡 于 2020-2-29 19:57 编辑 

据我所知，如果要使告示牌所带的命令执行的话，
告示牌单行所要执行的命令必须写在json列表的第一个元素哩
也就是说 Text1:'[{<内容1+命令>},{<内容2>}]'是可执行命令的
而 Text1:'[{<内容1>},{<内容2+命令>}]'是不可执行命令的
